entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 80S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
HUMID WITH LOWS AROUND 70
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY SUNNY
LESS HUMID WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 80
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY CLEAR
